mapper.update:
update
set NAIRE_TEMPLATE_ID=#{NAIRE_TEMPLATE_ID}, CUSTOM_TEMPLATE_ID=#{CUSTOM_TEMPLATE_ID}, TYPE=#{TYPE}, TASKNAME=#{TASKNAME}, COMPLETEDATE=#{COMPLETEDATE}, STATE=#{STATE}, TASKMAN=#{TASKMAN}, CREATEMAN=#{CREATEMAN}, CREATEDATE=now() where ID = #{ID}

update
set FPTYPE=#{FPTYPE}, ZXZ=#{ZXZ}, ZXIDSTR=#{ZXIDSTR} where ID = #{ID}
mapper.select:
select a.ID, a.NAIRE_TEMPLATE_ID, a.CUSTOM_TEMPLATE_ID, a.TYPE, a.TASKNAME, COMPLETEDATE,
a.STATE, a.TASKMAN, a.CREATEMAN, a.CREATEDATE, a.TABLENAME, a.FPTYPE, a.ZXZ, a.ZXIDSTR from a where ID = #{ID}
